content: like i did first of all as picture below this is the break down of amounts of yarn needed to make the various parts foot base all 4 48g all pad cricles & limbs 20g body 22g head 20g mane 218g for a full head of locks ears 4g nose 2g tail 8g eyes oddments of black & white smiley mouth oddment of dark coloured yarn i used up some rowanspun 4ply/fingering weight yarnfor the main body parts in red orange turquoise purple & an oddment of green for nose the mane & tail are in kauni eq rainbow & the eyes in oddments of jaegar pure wool resources if you are having trouble finding any of the materials used here are some internet mail order companies i ve used kauni & rowan yarns astrid s dutch obsessions ships worldwide http //www astridsdutchobsessions com for your nearest stockist of rowan yarns see http //www knitrowan com for stuffing of various types & plastic pellet fillings christie bears ships worlwide http //www christiebears co uk for fantastic handmade amigurumi row markers etsy com sellers ship worldwide http //www etsy com online tutorials for help with magic magic_ring http //crochetme com/amigurumi for help with ladder stitching http //www embroiderersguild com/stitch/stitches/ladder html page 8 copyright © 2008 fiona kelly make for yourself but do not sell do not copy and distribute or sell this pattern thanks for respecting copyright any queries email me at creative textiles@btinternet com & see more of my designs at http //fionakelly wordpress com/
